original_text: And when thy herds and thy flocks multiply, and thy silver and thy gold is multiplied, and all that thou hast is multiplied;
korean_text: 또 네 소와 양이 번성하며 네 은금이 증식되며 네 소유가 다 풍부하게 될 때에

sentences.original_text: And when thy herds and thy flocks multiply,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 소와 양떼가 불어날 때에,

sentences.original_text: and thy silver and thy gold is multiplied,
and all that thou hast is multiplied;
